name: Prasinophobia HIDE N SEEK
description:
This Is A DLC version of the original game Prasinophobia that is 100% FREE! In this game, you and your friend go against one another in this split-screen tag game. The screen on the left is the seeker and the screen on the right is the hider. To make it competitive set a timer and see how long you survive!

Player On The Right

A - Look Left

D - Look Right

W - Move Forward

S - Move Backward

Player On Left

Same thing but the arrow keys
